extracted_playbook.title: Encrypt XML Configuration File
extracted_playbook.description: Encrypt the project file (XML configuration file) when stored to ensure its integrity.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to XML Configuration File
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the encrypted XML configuration file to only trusted users.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Communication Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: When exchanging project files over the network, use secure communication protocols to protect data integrity.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Source of Project Files
extracted_playbook.description: Only open project files received from a trusted source to prevent unauthorized access or tampering.

extracted_playbook.title: Compute and Verify Hash of Project Files
extracted_playbook.description: Compute a hash of the project files and regularly check the consistency of this hash to verify the integrity before usage.

extracted_playbook.title: Subscribe to Schneider Electric's Security Notification Service
extracted_playbook.description: Subscribe to Schneider Electric's security notification service to stay informed of all updates, including details on affected products and remediation plans.

cve_id: SEVD-2025-014-04 Web Server on Modicon M340 and BMXNOE0100/0110, BMXNOR0200H communication modules
